title: Nice 'n' spicy chicken wraps
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon paprika', '1/2 teaspoon hot cayenne pepper', '1/4 teaspoon cracked black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon chilli flakes', '1/2 teaspoon minced garlic', '1/4 teaspoon salt', 'juice of 1/2 lime', '1 large (about 300g) boneless skinless chicken breast', '1 to 2 teaspoons olive oil', '2 sourdough wraps', '5 cherry tomatoes, halved', '1/2 avocado, cubed', '50g feta cheese, cubed', '1 to 2 sprigs fresh coriander, torn', '2 tablespoons soured cream (optional)']
